scripts.start-production-process: export NODE_ENV=production && pm2 start ./index.js --name wiki-globe-production && pm2 logs wiki-globe-production --nostream --lines 30
scripts.stop-production-process: pm2 stop wiki-globe-production --no-treekill 2>/dev/null || true && pm2 delete wiki-globe-production  2>/dev/null || true
scripts.post-receive: echo 'Starting the script' >> ../tmp.txt && npm run stop-production-process && echo 'Updating git' >> ../tmp.txt && git fetch origin master && git reset --hard origin/master && echo 'npm i' >> ../tmp.txt && npm i && echo 'Starting new process' >> ../tmp.txt && npm run start-production-process
